problem_text:
13.50. Let F be a local Fitting class. Is it true that there are no maximal elements in the partially ordered by inclusion set of the Fitting classes contained in F and distinct from F?
A. N. Skiba
answer: No, there may exist maximal elements (N. V. Savel’eva, N. T. Vorob’ev, Siberian Math. J., 49, no. 6 (2008), 1124–1130).
